overview: Nothing can stop these dirty old men from finding dumb and desperate teens who will do anything for a little bit of dough. They teach these girls what it's like to be with not just one, but two real men, and they learn that a little bit of cash can go a long way on a hot teen looking for some shopping money. Watch the teen next door be turned into a nasty little whore!
tagline: They're Young, They're Dumb & They'll Do Anything For Money!
title: Teens For Cash 12
